steps.title: Join & download Jellyfin
Welcome
steps.markdown:
# Welcome to Our Media Server

Thanks for your interest in joining my shared media library; to help you get free from any streaming subscriptions that you may have to save some of that bread ğŸ¥–

## What You're Getting Access To

- **Movies** â€” A curated collection of films
- **TV Shows** â€” Series old and new
- **On-demand streaming** â€” Watch anytime, anywhere. 

*Possible hickups in your streaming if I have to restart the service for any reason. It takes less than 20 seconds so you might not even notice!*

## *Before You Continue..*

By accepting this invitation, you agree to:

- Keep your login credentials private. Or not lol. It's your life.
- Not share access with others... JK. We're not Netflix. But it's free. Just ask for a invite link. 
- Stream responsibly. I'm not sure how you'll break this rule though, but don't try me. 

Click **Next** when you're ready to create your account.

steps.title: What is Jellyfin?
What You'll Need
steps.markdown:
# What You'll Need

Before accepting, make sure you have:

## Supported Devices

Jellyfin works on most devices including phones, tablets, smart TVs, and web browsers.

## Recommended

- Stable internet connection
- Updated web browser (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- The Jellyfin app for the best mobile experience

Ready to join? Click **Next** to accept your invitation.

steps.title: Tips for the best experience
steps.markdown:
## ğŸ Get the best quality

1. **Set streaming quality to original** â€“ Settings â†’ Playback  
2. **Enable hardware decoding** if your device supports it for smoother 4K. ğŸ¿  
3. **Prefer Ethernet over Wi-Fi** on smart-TVs.

steps.title: Save This URL!
steps.markdown:
# âš ï¸ IMPORTANT - Save This URL!

## ğŸ“‹ How to Connect

1. **Long-press** the URL above to copy it
2. Open the **Jellyfin app** on your device
